QAPair.Question: What is (are) DHEA-sulfate test ?
QAPair.Answer: DHEA stands for dehydroepiandrosterone. It is a hormone produced by the adrenal glands in both men and women. It can be converted to other hormones that have weak male (androgenic) effects. The DHEA-sulfate test measures the amount of DHEA-sulfate in the blood.

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for DHEA-sulfate test? ?
